8507332.name: Chaotic Exchanger
description: Grenade Hits grant Chaotic Exchange, granting <:pve:922884406073507930>2000% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1000%] Additional Grenade Regeneration Rate for 1.75 seconds.
Charged Vortex Grenade can proc twice if enemies get hit by the initial explosion and the last few ticks.

11551321.name: Iron Grip
description: Passively grants 20 Stability and -30 Reload Speed.

11612903.name: Adrenaline Junkie
description:
On Weapon or Grenade Kill:
20 Handling and a Stacking Damage Increase for 4.5 seconds.
Buff Refreshed on Kill. Grenade Kills grant all 5 Stacks instantly.






Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased by 0.5 seconds, to a maximum of 5 seconds.

47981717.name: Opening Shot
description: For the first bullet only undefined:
20 Aim Assist, 25 Range, -5% Accuracy Cone Size, -10% Accuracy Cone Growth undefined.
3.1 seconds cooldown, resets if the weapon is shot.

117669763.name: The Dance
description: While within 15 meters of an enemy: Multi-Dodge Ready appears on the Buff list.
After Dodging within 15 meters of an Enemy:
Can dodge up to 6 times per activation.
Multi-Dodge Dodges are unaffected by Mods that activate on Class Ability Use, alongside Winter's Shroud.
Effect immediately ends if you are over 15 meters away from an Enemy while Multi-Dodge is active.

124408337.name: Headstone
description: Spawns a Large <:stasis:915198000727461909>Stasis Crystal on Enemy Death Location.
Rank-and-File Combatants spawn a Medium Stasis Crystal.
Having 5 crystals active at once incurs in a 5 second cooldown.

185514250.name: Glacial Guard
description: Grants Shielded buff and applies 40 Slow Stacks to Combatants within 7 meters.
Shielded lasts 20 seconds and grants a 100HP Overshield <:pve:922884406073507930>with 62.5% Damage Resist./>
Shielded also refreshes on damage taken, prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
While Shielded is active, you cannot regain Class Ability Energy.
Activating Barricade while Glacial Guard is active will remove the effect.

201365942.name: Archer's Tempo
description: Decreases Draw Time by 25% for 3 seconds.
Enhanced: Budd duration increased to 4 seconds.

205890336.name: Underdog
description: Up to +100 Reload Speed with 0.9x RDS undefined
Effect increases linearly as health decreases

235075862.name: Peregrine Strike
description: Shoulder Charges deal increased damage if used midair
For Combatant Classifications, check out [ this sheet](https://d2clarity.page.link/combatantundefined!

236605015.name: Vanishing Execution
description: Gain Invisibility on Powered Melee Kill. (Longer on Finishers)
Heals for X on Powered Melee Kill. (Stronger on Finishers)
Bosses and Vehicles are not finishable. Generally.

242794439.name: Reflective Vents
description: During slide after sprinting for at least 1.5 seconds:
Generate a 180Â° frontal shield that reflects damage and projectiles.

247725512.name: Rapid Hit
description:
Gain 1 Rapid Hit Stack per Precision Hit, granting Reload Speed and Stability for 2 seconds.



Enhanced: Stronger Effect.

280464955.name: Firmly Planted
description: 30 Handling, 20 Stability, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, -17% Accuracy Cone Growth undefined, -80% Recoil Yaw (Horizontal Recoil)

354401740.name: Assassin's Blade
description: 15% Increased Damage and sets Forward Movement Speed to 9 meters per second (Max Sprint Speed)

371216963.name: Radar Tuner
description: Radar immediately returns after stopping ADS. (Normally takes 1.5s)

384759954.name: Bring the Heat
description: Fusion Grenades have Fastball intrinsically and detonate on impact.
Kills with Fusion Grenades grant Grenade Energy.

384759955.name: Burning Fists
description: Grants Burning Fists on Melee Kill.
Burning Fists lasts 5 seconds and grants Bonus Melee Damage.

395373724.name: Scatter Charge
description: Scatter Grenades innately receive Chaos Accelerant's undefined Tracking Bonus

409831596.name: Proximity Grenades
description: Grenades fired from this weapon have increased proximity detection but a decreased blast radius.

438098033.name: Harmony
description:
Upon readying a weapon within 3 seconds of getting a Kill with a different weapon:

20% Increased Damage and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.




Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 8 seconds.

454085387.name: Blunt Execution Rounds
description: Upon dealing Melee Damage while an Enemy is within 15 meters:
<:pve:922884406073507930>500%/><:pvp:922884468275019856>[100%]/> increased damage for one burst and 100 Handling for 10 seconds or until firing.
4 second cooldown. Can be activated while stowed.
Any Powered Melee which requires sprinting, sliding, or performs a slam will not activate Blunt Execution Rounds.

469285294.name: Recombination
description: Elemental Kills grant 1 stack of Recombination, increasing the damage of the next shot of the weapon.

481860150.name: Wish-Dragon Teeth
description: Tripmine Grenades are enhanced and have Fastball intrinsically.
X% Bigger Radius, with no Damage Falloff.
Last 30 seconds (10 -> 30) and have <:pvp:922884468275019856>100HP with 50% Damage Resist.
Ability Damage recharges 33% of Grenade Ability.

481860151.name: Spring-Loaded Mounting
description: Passively grants 50 Airborne Effectiveness, 100 Handling and 100 Reload Speed to Sidearms.
Upon readying a sidearm while at Critical Health:
<:pve:922884406073507930>100% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[35%] increased damage until no longer critical.

509074078.name: Steady Hands
description: X (a lot of) Handling for all weapons for 8 seconds.
Can be refreshed to up to 6 seconds.

515704826.name: Invader Tracker
description: Damaging the Invader with this weapon marks them for allies.

518387148.name: Sprint Grip
description: X Handling for Y seconds after sprinting for Z seconds.

553093017.name: Beyond The Veil
description: Grants an extra Smoke Bomb Charge.
Cloaking allies grants 50% Melee Energy per ally.
<:pve:922884406073507930>50% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[25%] Damage Resistance on any Invisible effects. Applies to teammates made invisible.
Damage Resistance does not apply in Super.

557221067.name: Killing Tally
description: 10% | 20% | 30% increased damage until stow or reload.
Enhanced: Passively grants 10 Magazine Stat (Identical to Tactical Mag).

569260333.name: Force Multiplier
description: Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Shotguns.
Shotgun Kills restore Melee Ability Energy.
If your Void Melee Ability is Charged:
Shotgun Kills activates Void Overshield and consume your Melee Energy.

588594999.name: Moving Target
description: Passively grants 10 Aim Assist, and 3% Reduced Movement Speed Penalty from ADS and Strafing.
Enhanced: Aim Assist bonus is increased marginally.

593361144.name: Wraithmetal Mail
description: Grants 100 Handling (w/ 0.95x Multiplier), 100 Reload, and 50 Mobility.

593361146.name: Synapse Junctions
description: Hits grant Synapse Junctions for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 3.
x1 = 13.5% Increased damage and X% Slower Passive Super Drain
x2 = 28.8% Increased damage and X% Slower Passive Super Drain
x3 = 46.2% Increased damage and X% Slower Passive Super Drain

593361147.name: Probability Matrix
description: Additive 25% Chance per Enemy hit with Arcbolt Grenade to recharge your Grenade Ability
Arcbolt Grenades chain up to 4 times (from 3)

595829387.name: Cross Counter
description: Receiving or Dealing Melee Damage grants Cross Counter for 3 seconds or until Melee Hit.
Cross Counter grants 200% increased Melee Damage and heals for XHP on Melee Hit.
One-Two Punch's bonus is reduced to 80% if Cross Counter is active.

622433369.name: Warlord's End
description: Melee Kills, as well as Finishers weaken and blind, rendering the enemy unable to shoot and receive 30% increased damage.
Duration and Range are dependant on Enemy Rank.
Finishers add 5 seconds to Duration. Bosses are not finishable. Guardians count as Elites.

671806388.name: Compulsive Reloader
description: 50 Reload Speed with a 0.95x Duration Scale

689005463.name: Accelerated Coils
description: Decreases charge time by 40, and damage by 2%

692285813.name: Light Shift
description: Shift has a distance of 10 meters, and renders you completely invisible except for a trail for the duration of the shift.
Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
<:pve:922884406073507930>Light Shift grants 10% increased damage to Slowed/Frozen targets, as well as granting 10% increased damage to Arc Weapons.
Dodge does not recharge while Light Shift buff is active.

699525795.name: Eye of the Storm
description:
While at Low Health:
Up to 30 Handling, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, and -17% Accuracy Cone Growth undefined.

Effect increases linearly as Health decreases. Maximized strength at Critical Health.




Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Stability.

699693452.name: Vengeance
description: Taking damage highlights the enemy that caused it for 8 seconds.
Killing the targeted enemy grants Vengeance for 6 seconds.

706527188.name: Quickdraw
description:
On Ready:
100 Ready/Stow Handling with a 0.95x Duration Multiplier for 1 second, or until ADS.




Enhanced: Passively grants 5 Handling.

722862450.name: Dearly Departed
description: Grants <:pve:922884406073507930>25%/><:pvp:922884468275019856>[15%]/> Damage Resist to Guardians inside your Rift.
Dearly Departed grants <:pve:922884406073507930>55%<:pvp:922884468275019856>[27.5%] Class Ability Energy.
Buff lasts until no longer Critical.
Spawns a Healing Rift for 15 seconds.

736000386.name: Freehand Grip
description: -X% Hipfire Accuracy Cone Growth undefined and 0.95x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier

744594675.name: Well-Rounded
description: Using your Grenade, hitting an enemy with a Charged Melee Attack, or using your Super Ability grants stacks of Well-Rounded. Super Ability grants two.
10 Range, 10 Stability, and 10 Handling per stack.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 11 seconds.

744770875.name: Adept Charge Time
description: Does not reduce damage, unlike Charge Time MW.
Does not display in the stats.

776531651.name: Repulsor Brace
description: On Weapon Kill against an enemy affected by a Void Debuff:
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 9 seconds.

806159697.name: Trench Barrel
description:
After dealing non-ranged Melee Damage:
50% Increased damage, X Reload Speed, and 30 Handling for 5 seconds OR 3 shots.




Enhanced: Buff Effect is increased.

818211479.name: Shattering Blade
description: If Heavy Attack consumes the last Ammo:
67% Increased damage to Grounded Heavy Attack.

824488952.name: Seriously, Watch Out
description: If Shoulder Charge Melee Ability is Charged:
Slowly grants 75 HP Overshield over 3 seconds after sprinting for 0.5 seconds
Overshield disappears instantly when not sprinting.
Recharges 50% of Melee Ability on Shoulder Charge Hit.
Includes Seismic Strike, Ballistic Slam, Hammer Strike, Shield Bash

830282363.name: Phase Magazine
description: Sets the Submachine Gun's Damage and Magazine Profile into that of a Precision Frame's.

883550427.name: And Another Thing
description: Does not Stack with Top Tree Striker

897181301.name: Rapid Cooldown
description: Gain an additional <:pve:922884406073507930>100%<:pvp:922884468275019856>[200%] of your Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.

902934539.name: Blessing of Order
description: Standing in a Rift creates Noble Seekers every 5 seconds that seeks out allies within 35 meters and apply a buff depending on the type of Rift.
Each time a Noble Seeker applies a buff, the Rift gets extended by 5 seconds.
Healing Rift Noble Seekers heal allies for 75HP and begins Health Regeneration.
Empowering Rift Noble Seekers grant a <:pve:922884406073507930>35% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[20%] Damage Increase for 5 seconds.

908147344.name: Sneak Bow
description: Prevents Radar Ping from shooting, increased Reload Speed, and increases hold time by 25%

921817150.name: Fervid Coldsnap
description: Grants an extra Coldsnap Grenade Charge.
Coldsnap Grenades have better tracking and grant [?]% Grenade Ability upon both hit and freezing an enemy.

926349160.name: Tome of Dawn
description: Aiming Down Sights while Airborne grants Tome of Dawn.
Lasts for 2.8 seconds. Hits refresh Y seconds.

926349161.name: Fusion Harness
description: Gain an extra Fusion Grenade Charge.
20% Grenade Energy per Weapon Hit while Empowered (0.3s Cooldown)
100% Class Ability Energy on Grenade Kill
Empowered is either Well of Radiance or Empowering Rift.

926976844.name: Resolute
description: Casting Fists of Havoc grants Resolute.
Resolute is a 75HP Overshield that negates Precision Damage.
Overshield can be refreshed by unequipping and equipping but who is gonna do that to be quite honest.

957782887.name: Snapshot Sights
description: 0.5x Aim Down Sights Animation Scalar for Primary Weapons
0.75x Aim Down Sights Animation Scalar for Special Weapons

960810156.name: Danger Zone
description: Sets Blast Radius to 100[?] and reduces Self Damage undefined by 40%.

972757866.name: Pulse Monitor
description:
Immediately upon being reduced below 110 HP:
Refreshes undefined weapon, 50 Handling, and grants 5% Faster Ready/Stow Speed.

Works while stowed.




Enhanced: Health Requirement reduced.

984527513.name: Major Spec
description: 7.77% Damage Increase against Elites and Minibosses

1015611457.name: Kill Clip
description: On Reload, within 3.8 seconds of a Weapon Kill:
Buff can't be refreshed. Persists through stow.
Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 5.5 seconds.

1048183818.name: Adaptive Munitions
description: Upon hitting a Non-Matching Shield or a Barrier Champion Shield:
Hits deal increasingly higher damage against Combatant Shields, up to 500% increased damage.
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.
29% per hit, up to 435%: Fusion Rifles
**33.3% per hit, up to 500%: Auto Rifles, Machine Guns, Pulse Rifles, Trace Rifles **
150% per hit, up to 450%: Linear Fusion Rifles [Maxes at 450%]
**166.6% per hit, up to 500%: Bows, Glaives, Hand Cannons, and Scout Rifles **
Enhanced: Damage Increase per stack and Maximum Damage Increase are increased by a multiplicative 20%

1095471953.name: Embers of Light
description: Daybreak Kills spawn both an Empowering and Healing Rift on Enemy Death Location.
Solar Weapon Kills grant X% Class Ability Energy.
While your Class Ability Energy is Full:
Weapon Kills consume your Class Ability Energy and spawn a Empowering + Healing Rift at the Target's Location.

1140096971.name: Seraph Rounds
description: Combines the penetration from Armor-Piercing Rounds, the guaranteed ricochets from Ricochet Rounds, and the flinch increase from High-Caliber Rounds.

1142806944.name: Planetary Torrent
description: While surrounded by at least 3 enemies within 15 meters, gain Class Ability Energy per Second.
An Arc Shockwave is cast that deals <:pve:922884406073507930>300 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[100] damage and heavily knockbacks in a 7.5 meter radius.

1147638875.name: Cobra Totemic
description: Passively grants 10 Airborne Effectiveness, 32 Reload and Handling to all weapons.

1155472384.name: Biotic Enhancements
description: While Surrounded by 3+ enemies: Activates Biotic Enhancements
Biotic Enhancements increases Melee and Super damage for 8 seconds.
Increases Melee Lunge Range to 7 meters.

1155472386.name: Fury Conductors
description: Melee Hits grant Stacks of Fury Conductors.
Receiving melee damage unleashes an <:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Explosion with a radius of 5 metres.
<:arc:720178925317128243>Arc Explosion deals 22% of your Melee Damage per Stack of Fury Conductors.
Fury Conductors grants 33-55-70% Damage Resistance to Melee Attacks depending on number of Stacks.
All Stacks disappear upon receiving melee damage or after 10 seconds of not dealing melee damage.

1155472387.name: Horns of Doom
description: Powered Void Melee Kills grant <:pve:922884406073507930>20% <:pvp:922884468275019856>[10%] Super Energy once per usage.
Sentinel Shield's Shield Throws regenerate 10% Super Energy

1163213078.name: Cauterizing Flame
description: Upon reaching Critical Health if your Class Ability is charged:
Casting your Class Ability spawns a Sunspot.

1168162263.name: Outlaw
description: 70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x RDS undefined for 6 seconds.

1195158366.name: Encore
description:
On Precision Kill: 10 Range per Stack, up to 30 Range at 3 Stacks.



On Non-Precision Kill: Removes 1 Stack. If at zero stacks, it grants -X% Accuracy Cone Growth undefined, -Y% Accuracy Cone Size, and 30 Stability.

Lasts 7 seconds. Refreshed on Kill.

Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased.

1211775759.name: Ascending Amplitude
description: Kills during Stormtrance grant Stacks of Ascending Amplitude for 8 seconds.
Ascending Amplitude increases Stormtrance Damage by 10% per Stack, up to 100% at 10 Stacks.
Refunds up to 50% of Super Energy based on Enemy Kills.

1250481499.name: Extrovert
description: While surrounded by [?] enemies or by a Nightmare within [?] meters:

1264398905.name: Celerity
description: 100 Handling, Reload, and Aim Assist, massively decreased flinch received, increased accuracy, stronger scope highlight, and enables radar while ADS.
Passively grants 20 Handling and 20 Reload Speed

1275731761.name: Cluster Bomb
description: Each Cluster Bomb deals an additional 3% damage.

1281216113.name: Stunning Recovery
description: Stunning a Champion refreshes undefined X% of your Magazine, heals 60HP, and grants 40 Recovery for 3 seconds.

1331592343.name: Starless Night
description: Guarding with Banner Shield blinds enemies within 7 metres for 5 seconds.
Any Ward of Dawn that you create grants Starless Night, which gives a 65HP Void Overshield to any ally that enters.
Enemies that enter your Ward of Dawn are also blinded for 5 seconds.

1341199512.name: Devouring Rift
description: Empowering Rift grants Overload Shot, allowing all weapons to disrupt on hit. (Weapons with Breaker Properties will not benefit from this.)
Does not work with Well of Radiance.

1354429876.name: Fourth Time's the Charm
description: Scoring 4 Precision Hits generates 2 Ammo to Magazine.
Precision Hit counter is reset if no precision hits are scored within 2 seconds.
Enhanced: Timer between Precision Hits is increased.

1359896290.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
description: Gradually greatly increases Accuracy, and adds up to +10 Stability. Takes 0.6 seconds to maximize effect.
The accuracy improvement is greater than initial accuracy.
The accuracy increase is gradual, almost completely negating the effects of bloom.
Enhanced: Effect reaches full effect sooner.

1420473289.name: Blood Magic
description: Weapon Kills while inside an Empowering or Healing Rift grant Blood Magic
Blood Magic halts the duration of the Rift.
5 seconds of per Kill. Caps at 15 seconds.

1427256713.name: Reservoir Burst
description: 25% Increased damage and causes enemies to explode on death.

1428297954.name: Perpetual Motion
description: Gain a Stack after 2 seconds and an additional Stack after 10 seconds.
Being still for 0.5 seconds removes all stacks. Works while stowed.
Enhanced: Stacks remain for up to 1 second if not moving.

1431678320.name: Alloy Magazine
description: Upon reloading with an empty magazine:

1437147326.name: Myrmidon's Reach
description: Gain an additional Shield Throw charge.

1449897496.name: Adamantine Brace
description: Passively grants 40 Airborne Effectiveness to Bows.
Bows are able to hold perfect draws indefinitely.

1449897497.name: Sharp Edges
description: Blade Barrage Hits and Kills refund Super Energy.
Refund Amount depends on Kills and Hits, as well as Enemy Rank.

1457189155.name: Depths of Duskfield
description: Duskfield Grenades have [?]% increased radius and have a 152 second base cooldown.
While inside a Duskfield Grenade's Slowing Field:
When combined with Touch of Winter:
Crystal increases from Medium to Large, and radius is increased additively.

1471333428.name: Surrounded Spec
description: Additive 10% Increased Surrounded Damage Increase, and lingers for 1.5s

1523832109.name: Reconstruction
description: Refreshes 10% of Magazine Capacity. Maxes out at Double Magazine Capacity.

1528281896.name: Outlaw
description: 70 Reload Speed with a 0.9x RDS undefined for 6 seconds.

1536798515.name: Land Tank
description: 10 Resilience and 5% Damage Resist against Combatants for 5 seconds.

1546637391.name: Vorpal Weapon
description: Damage Increase against Bosses, Minibosses, and Vehicles.
The lower Damage Increase is against supers with no extra Damage Resistance.

1556840489.name: Lead from Gold
description: Grants (almost) the equivalent of 1 Special Ammo Pickup.
Enhanced: Increases the amount of Special Ammo received.

1561002382.name: High-Caliber Rounds
description: <:pve:922884406073507930>Allows Primary Weapons to affect higher ranked enemies and consistently stunlock Minors.
<:pvp:922884468275019856>Flinch amount against Guardians varies between Weapon Archetypes, from 6% to 11% Increased Flinch received.

1561789734.name: Firefly
description: Target explodes, dealing Solar Damage in a 3 meter radius. Same size as Dragonfly, but deals 25% increased damage.

1570042021.name: Heating Up
description: -15% Accuracy Cone Growth undefined, 15 Stability, and ~20 Recoil Direction.

1583705720.name: Stats for All
description:
After Damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each:
10 Range with 5% Increased Falloff Distance, 10 Stability, 35 Handling, and 35 Reload Speed with 0.95x RDS undefined for 10 seconds.
Buff can't be refreshed.






Enhanced: Buff Duration is increased to 11 seconds.

1600092898.name: Backup Plan
description: For 4 seconds after readying a Fusion Rifle:
30% Faster Charge Rate, 20% decreased damage, and 100 Handling

1607056502.name: Hakke Breach Armaments
description: 15% Increased Damage against Vehicles and Constructs
30% Increased Damage against Turrets, Barricades, and Stasis Crystals
Check out [https://d2clarity.page.link/combatant Court's Spreadsheet/>](undefinedundefined for Combatant Classifications.

1645158859.name: Under Pressure
description: As Magazine goes below 50% until empty:
Up to -% Accuracy Cone Size, -% Accuracy Cone Growth undefined, and 30[?] Stability.

1667892708.name: Sunfire Furnace
description: 75% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate
350% Additional Base Grenade and Melee Regeneration Rate

1667892710.name: Survival Well
description: Generates a Healing Pulse which heals both the user and allies within 12 metres.
Healing Pulse heals for either 58 HP OR to 130HP, depending on which is highest.
Supers generate 1 extra Orb of Power.

1667892711.name: Auto-Loading Link
description: Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Auto Rifles and Machine Guns.
Refreshes 10% of equipped Auto Rifle/Machine Gun magazine every 1.5 seconds.

1683379515.name: Disruption Break
description: On Elemental/Barrier Champion or Guardian Shield Break:
Debuffs the enemy, increasing Kinetic Damage by 50% for 5.5 seconds.
Stacks with other Debuffs, as it is a Weapon Perk.

1687452232.name: Liquid Coils
description: Increases charge time by 40, and damage by 2%

1694242448.name: Illegally Modded Holster
description: 100 Handling Ready Speed with 0.6 Duration Multiplier, 20 Airborne Effectiveness, and -40% Accuracy Cone Size on Ready for 4 seconds.
Upon readying a Kinetic or Matching Hand Cannon with a Full Magazine:
<:pve:922884406073507930>60% Increased damage per Hit for 5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.
For Exotic Hand Cannon interactions, go to [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1i1KUwgVkd8qhwYj481gkV9sZNJQCE-C3Q-dpQutPCi4/edit#rangeid=1312688627 Court's Spreadsheet/>](undefinedundefined
After the Buff runs out, you swap weapons, or firing after the 5 second period:
You cannot gain stacks or reacquire the buff for 10 seconds.

1694242449.name: Uncanny Arrows
description: Deadfall returns Ability Energy per Enemy Tethered.
X% Super Energy. Max of 50% Super Energy.
Moebius Quiver can fire an additional volley per Super Activation.

1694242450.name: Hydraulic Boosters
description: Triple Jump = 6 meters -> 7 meters for First Jump (16% higher)
9 meters -> 11 meters for Second Jump (22% higher)

1716000303.name: Concussion Grenades
description: Grenades fired from this weapon emit a blast that staggers enemies.

1731450287.name: Clenched Fist
description: Maxes out Sword's Guard Resistance, Efficiency, and Endurance.
Perfectly timed blocks heal for 80(?) HP.
Sword Energy does not decay from blocking damage or holding guard.

1749209109.name: Relentless Strikes
description: After 3 Powered Hits within [2?] seconds of each:

1754714824.name: Kickstart
description: During Slide, after Sprinting for 1.5 seconds:
20% Increased damage and 100ms increased Charge Rate for [?] seconds.

1771339417.name: Firing Line
description: While within X meters of 2+ Allies:

1774574192.name: Osmosis
description: Changes Weapon Element to match your selected Subclass until stowed.

1799762209.name: Cornered
description: Charge/Draw Time is reduced by 100 miliseconds.

1828251441.name: Assault Barricade
description: Assault Barricade has reduced health and duration, but enables you and your allies to shoot through it.

1837151577.name: Dragonfly Spec
description: 50% Increased Damage and Radius for Dragonfly explosions

1844314558.name: Parting Gift
description: Drops a Parting Gift that explodes and deals 120 damage over 7.5 meters with a 1(?) second fuse.
Parting Gift has an additional effect based on Subclass:
<:stasis:915198000727461909>Slows for 2 seconds and refreshes existing Slow Stacks. Does not apply Slow Stacks
<:void:720178940240461864>Suppress for <:pve:922884406073507930>9 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[7] seconds <highlight_3 (Does not apply to Guardians in Super) />
<highlight_4 Suppression generally does not activate effects that activate on suppressing./>

1866048759.name: Hip-Fire Grip
description: 20% Increased: Aim Assist Falloff Distance, Reticle Stickiness Falloff Distance, Damage Falloff Start and End Distance
Damage Falloff Multipliers do not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.

1885400500.name: Ricochet Rounds
description: Bullets are guaranteed to ricochet off of surfaces.

1890422124.name: Tap the Trigger
description: 40 Stability, -50% Max Recoil Kick, and -10% Accuracy Cone Size for 0.6 seconds.
<highlight_3 Fusion Rifles Only Receive 25% of the benefits />
Enhanced: Stronger Effect, duration increased to 0.76 seconds.
<highlight_1 [Controller-Only] /> Weapon fires the instant trigger pressure is applied.

1905044254.name: To Excess
description: On Weapon kill while your Super is charged:

1919923227.name: Overflowing Light
description: Ability use grants Empowered for other abilities for <:pve:922884406073507930>10<:pvp:922884468275019856>[5] seconds, depending on the Ability used.
e.g.: Barricade -> Empowered Melee and Empowered Grenade.
Empowered Barricade: X% | Y% Increased HP.

1939153390.name: Close Enough
description: Chaos Reach recovers 10% Super Ability Energy on hit. 0.75s Cooldown.
Can increase Super Duration by up to 100%.

1954620775.name: Timed Payload
description: Splits 55% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals <:pve:922884406073507930>30% Increased Damage and has no damage falloff. Detonates after 0.6 seconds.

1968497646.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
description: Bullets are able to overpenetrate enemies once.

2010801679.name: Ambitious Assassin
description: After Reloading within X seconds of Weapon Kills:

2030760728.name: Energy Transfer

2039302152.name: Slideways

2077819806.name: Eager Edge
description: 100% Increased Lunge Range for 1 second. (Enough to execute 2 light attacks.)

2117683199.name: Full Auto Trigger System

10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns exclusively.

2119325971.name: Vanishing Shadow
description: Void Invisibility effects last 2 seconds longer.

2172504645.name: Sleight of Hand

2179827240.name: Roast 'Em

2213355989.name: High-Impact Reserves

2224838837.name: Unstoppable Force

2244851822.name: Flash Counter

2284787283.name: Clown Cartridge

2360754333.name: Trench Barrel

2451262963.name: Fragile Focus

2500502982.name: Firewalker

3824622015.name: Grasp of the Devourer
